name: Yifan Sun_Exercise 1
description: This is a Rube Goldberg Machine started with a sphere rolling down from a slope. The sphere drops and hits multiple sets of dominos and seesaw. Also, I combined a zero-gravity capsule and a seesaw to activate the dominos above. At the end, two cylinders will be activated. They will scroll to the rightmost of the edge and knock two cubes down.
